SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_GETCHILDREN
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Retrieve the kids for the children collection on the interaction extension forms
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_GETCHILDREN ( @INTERACTIONID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns table as return ( select int_extchild.ID, int_extchild.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID, dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCHILDLOOKUPID (int_extchild.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID, 1) as CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME as CHILDNAME
from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONCHILDREN int_extchild left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = int_extchild.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID
where int_extchild.INTERACTIONID = @INTERACTIONID )
